div.p: This is a draft for what an ATNA Audit Record might look like if provided as a set of FHIR resources. This is work in progress performed collaboratively between HL7 and IHE for the MHD/mHealth initiatives. Neither HL7 nor IHE is committed to pursuing this path - it is simply being evaluated as a possibility.
Things to note about the current design:

ul.li: in FHIR, Participant Object Detail is handled as extensions
